Package com.atakmap.comms

Class CommsProvider.MissionPackageReceiveStatusUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.comms.CommsProvider.MissionPackageReceiveStatusUpdate
  • Enclosing class:
    CommsProvider
    public static final class CommsProvider.MissionPackageReceiveStatusUpdate
extends java.lang.Object
    A bundle of information about an ongoing or just completed inbound Mission Package transfer.

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • localFile

        public final java.io.File localFile
        The local file identifying which transfer the update pertains to. Will match a File previously returned in a call to MissionPackageIO's missionPackageReceiveInit()

      • status

        public final com.atakmap.commoncommo.MissionPackageTransferStatus status
        The current status of the transfer. Can be one of: FINISHED_SUCCESS FINISHED_FAILED ATTEMPT_IN_PROGRESS ATTEMPT_FAILED

        The FINISHED_* status codes indicate this will be the final update for this MP transfer. The ATTEMPT_* codes indicate that another status report will be forthcoming.

      • totalBytesReceived

        public final long totalBytesReceived
        Total number of bytes received in this attempt.

      • totalBytesExpected

        public final long totalBytesExpected
        Total number of bytes expected to be received to complete the transfer. Note: this number is provided by the sender and may not be accurate! If the sender does not provide the information, it will be reported as zero (0). Because of these limitations, totalBytesReceived could exceed this number! This number will remain the same in all status updates for a given transfer.

      • attempt

        public final int attempt
        The current download attempt, numbered stating at 1, and less than or equal to "maxAttempts". For ATTEMPT_FAILED updates, this is the attempt number that failed. For FINISHED_* updates, this is the attempt number that caused the final status update.

      • maxAttempts

        public final int maxAttempts
        The total number of attempts that will be made to download the Mission Package. This will be constant for all updates for a given transfer.

      • errorDetail

        public final java.lang.String errorDetail
        a textual description of why the transfer failed. This is only non-null when status is FINISHED_FAILED or ATTEMPT_FAILED

    • Constructor Detail
